CHAT.comment: mom and child speak simultaneously
INV sets the robodog in the middle of the room.
child squats down to touch robodog and it moves, she jumps back to her feet.
robodog stops moving and child shrugs her shoulders and arms.
child squats down to pet robodog.
child pets robodog and it moves.
mom gasps as she moves towards robodog and it moves.
child claps at robodog.
mom and child talk at the same time, and the child cannot be understood.
mom gasps then mom and child gasp together.
child moves chair in front of robodog and sits down.
robodog is stuck under chair and does not move.
child moves robodog to middle of the room.
child moves to put robodog on the couch.
mom and child speak simultaneously and child hands INV the robodog.
mom gasps and INV leaves the room.
child motions to put the car on the couch.
child sets car on the chair and walks toward the other chairs.
mom gasps as she opens the hood of the car.
child is whispering and mumbling as she organizes chairs and sits on the chair with the car and looks under the hood.
child rolls car back and forth on the table.
child runs car all over the table, scrubbing.
child sits in the chairs that are set up like a car with a front and back seat and puts the car in the back seat.
child walks over to table and remaining chairs.
child feels the seat cushion on the cushion.
child lines chair up with the other two.
child brings one chair back to the table.
child moves another chair back to the table.
child moves car from the table to the couch.
child moves the last chair back to the table.
mom hands the car to INV.
as INV walked out of the room, her words became distant.
INV took off the cover to the aquarium.
INV leaves the room.
child looks around tank.
child holds up fingers.
child jumps back from the tank.
child sits down at the table.
child gets out of the chair and approaches the tank.
child sits back down at the table.
child gets up and begins to walk around the table, pointing to chairs.
child approaches covered computer box.
child climbs onto couch.
INV covers fish tank.
INV laughs and child comes running into the room.
INV enters and puts the degu on the table.
child makes unintelligible noise to the degu.
child kisses the air towards the degu.
child kisses the air again.
child starts to pull on the cage.
child is whispering and is difficult to hear.
child kisses air.
the degu's tail is under the wood chips.
mom and child talk simultaneously and child trails off.
mom and child talk simultaneously.
child swings head back and forth.
child leans over cage and kisses the air and mom gasps.
mom gasps, INV enters, and degu runs around cage.
INV takes the degu out of the room.
child follows INV out of the room.
INV and child take the cover off the computer box.
child tries to pick up computer box.
child goes to table and begins to bring a chair back to the computer box.
child mumbles and it is difficult to decipher.
mom pushes child in the chair up to the computer box.
child moves the chair closer to the computer box.
child sits at computer box pretending to play a game.
child motions her hand in a circle, but because child is facing the wall her sound is muffled and it is difficult to hear what she is saying for a long phrase.
child plays with computer box and it makes noise.
computer box makes noises and mom gasps twice.
INV covers the computer box.
mom gasps and INV leaves the room.
child stands meerkat up on the floor.
meerkat falls over and mom gasps.
child brings meerkat over to the chair and sits down.
child kisses meerkat's nose.
mom and child are difficult to understand and mom smiles and laughs.
mom and child are whispering and very difficult to hear and mom moves meerkat away from child's face.
child nears the table with the meerkat and finds a spot under the table for him to “sleep.”
child moves the chair from the middle of the room to the table +...
child and mom are talking simultaneously.
